## 1. Introduction

We are going to work with the "Friends" data package from TidyTuesday.
It consists of 4 data sets: 
friends.csv : transcript of all dialogues containing information on the speaker, episode, season, scene, utterence
friends_emotions.csv : information on the emotions of each utterence with specified scene, episode, and season number
friens_entities.csv : character entities with info on utterence, scene, episode, season
